summary:
We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list.

We have class HttpApiBase. It seems to be a base class for HTTP API interactions, handling authentication, login/logout, sending requests, handling HTTP errors, and setting "become" (maybe impersonation). So summary: Provides foundational functionality for making HTTP API calls, managing authentication tokens, handling errors, and supporting user impersonation.

Business intent: To simplify integration with external HTTP services by abstracting request handling, authentication lifecycle, and error processing, enabling derived classes to implement specific API endpoints.

Keywords: http, api, base class, authentication, login, logout, request, error handling, impersonation, become, helper methods.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim? The constraint: Do NOT list method names verbatim. So we should avoid naming methods directly. But we can refer to functionality generically: authentication management, request sending, error handling, impersonation.

But "login", "logout" are method names; we should avoid using them verbatim. So we can say "user authentication" instead of login/logout. Also "send request" maybe okay but not method name. Use "dispatch HTTP calls". "set become" maybe "configure impersonation". "update_auth" maybe "refresh authentication credentials". Avoid method names.

Let's craft summary: "A foundational class that encapsulates common HTTP API operations such as managing authentication credentials, handling HTTP errors, configuring impersonation, and dispatching requests to external services."

Business intent: "To provide a reusable core for client libraries that interact with RESTful services, handling the lifecycle of authentication, error processing, and request execution so that subclasses can focus on specific endpoint logic."

Keywords list: ["http", "api", "authentication", "error handling", "request dispatch", "impersonation", "base class", "client library", "rest", "session management"].

Make sure JSON format with double quotes.

Return only JSON object.
